description:
One of the JCC transfer test special recommendation recruits. Ever since seeing Sakamoto in his assassin days, she`s been a diehard fan, idolizing him with unwavering devotion. Despite her youthful, schoolgirl-like appearance, she possesses extraordinary strength and dominates in battle with a rough, brawler-style fighting technique.
Source: Official page
name: Toramaru Nao
